author: Sung Jae Jang
comment: Everytime I click a word for dictionary i have to scroll down so much to see the dictionary, because of some random java script texts appear first.   Also, at least 1/3 of the articles fail to load its image/video, and it's annoying because when I click for furigana it tries to load again and it randomly scrolls down so i have to look for where i was reading each time i use the furigana button.  Would be 5stars for me if these issues were fixed.

reply.author: AOVILL TEAM
reply.content: Thanks a lot for your support!

author: Siavash Golkar
comment: Looks like a great app. But one feature that I would really like to see is the ability to adjust the distance between the lines. As it is right now, it is a little cramped for my eyes to read comfortably, especially with furigana enabled.   I would be a loyal subscriber if this feature is added.

author: Michelle Se
comment: Great app!  I wish there was an English translation so I can check my understanding.   When I try to follow links to the dictionary I get some kind of java script msg that I can't understand yet.  Also, I like the previous idea about difficulty levels.

reply.author: AOVILL TEAM
reply.content:
Thanks a lot for your support!
Regarding the dictionary, please scroll down to see the meanings of the words.

author: Tuan Nguyen Anh
comment: Hi, I must say your app is fantastic and it helps me greatly in studying japanese (I have purchased pro version). Only some minor issues prevent me give the app 5 star: Can you add a quick button to show/hide furigana along the article instead of settings? I used this feature many times when read articles (study purpose) and it's quite annoying to go back and forth of the screens. Also a tab for downloaded articles and another tab for online articles is better than going into settings to toggle the option.

reply.author: AOVILL TEAM
reply.content:
Thanks a lot for your support!
We will consider to improve the UI with your suggestions in future releases.

author: Benjamin Fercher
comment: Full of Ads, including interstitials, unnecessary notifications and the app itself is mediocre. When you tap on unknown vocabulary you have to scroll past some JavaScript warning before actually seeing the definition. Could be better. Removing Ads only available via subscribtion and for that it's not good enough in my opinion.

author: Katie Gower
comment: This app is so helpful for Japanese learners! Listening can be very helpful to train your ear, and hearing the pronunciation of words helps your speaking skills. So far the only minor issue I have found with this app is that you can't rewind or fastfoward the audio while it is paused. Other than that, this is app is amazing!

reply.author: AOVILL TEAM
reply.content: Thanks a lot for your support!

author: Kenn Goh
comment: Great app! Love it. Was wondering if there could be a feature highlighting the difficulty level of the words (in line with JLPT) for JLPT learners. (Just a suggestion). Thanks!!

reply.author: AOVILL TEAM
reply.content: Thank you a lot for your support!

author: Ari The Vampire Queen
comment: Edit : yes , that is obvious that's why I downloaded the app,  I "expect " that if there is a built in dictionary that it would have all the words in it of course I know some of the words but it's assuming I know more for this to be "easy" news..I can legitimately only read bits and pieces of the news articles in the app (I can read hiragana and katakana but that doesn't mean I can understand what it means) you're response had nothing to do with what I said ..I know who this app is for otherwise I wouldn't have downloaded it ??? Original review: You can only look up a few words in the dictionary meaning I don't know what about 98% of what the rest of it says so useless app..

reply.author: AOVILL TEAM
reply.content:
Dear Ari, 

Thanks a lot for your comments. We will consider to add the dictionary for all the words in the news.
Let us contact you once this feature is released.

Thanks & Best Regards,
